MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH4 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Whitehouse Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:10am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair an underground cable fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:20 PM on Monday, 04 January 2021.
